title: Generate a fresh project ZIP export download link

requirements.text: Generate a fresh ZIP archive export of the entire current project codebase (frontend, backend, static assets, and configuration files) and provide a new direct download link for that ZIP.

quotes: yes  generate a fresh download link for the ZIP now

acceptanceCriteria: A new ZIP export is generated from the current project state (not a previously cached artifact).
The ZIP includes frontend/, backend/, and the root config files specified by the export manifest.
A direct download URL for the new ZIP is produced and returned.

requirements.text: Validate that the generated ZIP download link is reachable and returns a ZIP payload before returning it to the user, and if the primary download host/domain is unreachable provide at least one alternative delivery option for the same ZIP export along with clear English instructions for the fallback.

quotes: yes  generate a fresh download link for the ZIP now

acceptanceCriteria: An automated check confirms the primary download URL is reachable and returns a ZIP (correct content-type/extension or ZIP signature).
If the primary URL cannot be reached from the automated check, at least one alternative download option is provided for the same ZIP artifact.
User-facing fallback instructions are provided in English and explain exactly how to download via the alternative option.

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all Motoko backend logic in the single actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features or change the Meraki website UI/UX as part of this request.
Do not add any third-party hosting or external database integrations.
